name: Dash
tagline: Prompt to run your entire workflow ‚Äî no tool-switching.
description: Dash is your AI agent for modern work. It connects to your apps, remembers your context, and gets things done ‚Äî so you stop wasting time switching, searching, and starting over. Full control, one conversation.

name: Ithy AI

description: Combine the world's best AIs to answer your hardest questions.

name: Kalyxa

description: Think stylists are only for celebs? Not here. Kalyxa makes real, expert styling affordable and personal. Get shopping help, outfit ideas, and confidence boosts ‚Äî all from stylists who get your vibe, your goals, and your budget.

name: vibe interviews
tagline: Get a job in weeks, not months
description: Land your dream job faster with AI-powered mock interviews. Get real-time feedback, enhance your confidence, and master interview skills to turn job hunting from months to weeks.

name: FireDraw

tagline: Effortless RSVP management for personal events
